text: hey everyone I've got a very exciting
announcement to make today as many of
you know my cookbook will be available
very very soon on march eight and I have
it in my hands right here I could not be
more happy with it it is so beautiful
and I cannot wait for you guys to have
it but what made me really really happy
is the fact that so many of you have
pre-ordered it and to me that just means
so much it tells me that you guys
believe in me you have faith in the book
and I just wanted to do something a
little special as a thank-you for all of
you who pre-order the book so here's
what I've got for you if you pre-order
the book you will have access to two
exclusive recipes and that means the
recipes are not in the book they're not
going to be on the YouTube channel their
recipes that I develop specifically for
this occasion especially as a thank you
for your support so it's super easy all
you have to do is once you've
pre-ordered the book go to the penguin
Random House website and the link will
be your right under this video in the
description and you just fill out a form
the form will ask you for the order
number and that's it you'll get to
download two recipes which would be in
full color PDFs with photos that I shot
myself these two recipes I won't tell
you what they are but they are recipes
that are personally meaningful to me so
once you have them would love to know
what you guys think about them i'm so
excited okay but there's more so that
giveaway is being organized by my
publisher penguin Random House but I
wanted to add a little bit of an extra
personal touch to it so once you've
gotten your two exclusive recipes you
will be automatically entered to win an
apron now this is no ordinary apron this
apron isn't is one that I will
personally so for you that's right i am
going to show you an apron now i have to
say that i am not a great slower i only
learned how to sew this past year so
this is not going to be easy for me but
i think it's going to be so much fun
you're gonna love it so I have an
example this was my practice piece so
what's cool about this apron is that it
is fully reversible so see you've got
this side which is cute and girly and
then maybe you want to share this with a
man so you turn it around and suddenly
it is a man friendly apron so here I'll
put it on for you tada look how cute it
is so this apron will be so customized
for you that I won't even make it until
I know who the winner is so that that
way you know once I find out who the
winner is you and I can have a little
conversation so you can let me know if
you want a girly apron or manly apron or
a little bit of both so that I won't
make an apron that you will absolutely
hate with you know pink stripes on it or
something like that so again the link to
everything you need it's pre-order the
book and to also get the two exclusive
recipes will be in the description of
this video and before I leave I just
wanted to let you know that this book is
it's really your book I mean I would
never have written it if it wasn't
because you guys asked me to write one
and I probably would not have finished
writing it because it was a lot of labor
of love if it wasn't for your continuous
support and love and always giving me
encouragement and so now that it's here
I really want to share it with you
because really this is our work together
so I can wait for you to have it and
thank you thank you so much for always
being wonderful and I will see you next
time bye
